title: Rex Alces
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]

[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:rex-alces/IMG_0379.png]]

> The third entry for the [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/forum/t-16702779/art-requests Art Request thread] I'm doing! <3 This is Researcher Rex Alces, assistant to the amazing Jay Everwood (the blorbo!!!! :D)
> My friend [[*user Uncle Nicolini]] requested this, and I had so much fun drawing it! I tried my best to fit with the description you gave me. If you haven't already- please go look at some of Nico's writing. Their [*http://www.scp-wiki.net/uncle-nicolini-author-page Author Page is right here], and they have both some of the most heartwrenching stuff I've read, and the funniest shit on the site. Either way- go check them out!
> And as always - if you like this, my author page is [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/dr-vikki-lost Here]

[[/=]]
